name.title: Name
name.description: Display name for the platform in Homebridge logs.

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Shelly RGBW2 devices to expose. Each channel becomes a Lightbulb accessory.

id.title: Device ID
id.description: Unique identifier for this Shelly (used for stable accessory UUIDs). Choose a stable name (e.g. ceiling-shelly).

host.title: Host
host.description: IP address or hostname of the Shelly RGBW2 in white mode.

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: Channels to expose (0–3). If omitted, channel 0 is used.

name.title: Name
name.description: Optional display name for this channel accessory.

pollIntervalSeconds.title: Poll interval (seconds)
pollIntervalSeconds.description: How often to refresh state from the Shelly. Default 5s.

requestTimeoutMs.title: Request timeout (ms)
requestTimeoutMs.description: HTTP request timeout when calling the Shelly.

transitionOnMs.title: On transition (ms)
transitionOnMs.description: Optional transition time when turning on (pass-through to Shelly).

transitionOffMs.title: Off transition (ms)
transitionOffMs.description: Optional transition time when turning off (pass-through to Shelly).

username.title: Username
username.description: Shelly HTTP username (if authentication is enabled).

password.title: Password
password.description: Shelly HTTP password (if authentication is enabled).
